content.raw:
the error message about optix not being supported should be fine, it'll just try to render with ogre. 

I'm trying to debug the segfault but I've not yet been able to reproduce it. Looking at the backtrace, it's going to the BaseCamera's `Update` function, but strangely, simple_demo doesn't call that function. Maybe there was a leftover install or local modifications? Can you help me check if `GlutWindow.cc:177` points to [this line](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/498262e3d384f5cc0fa05c67c3e830548ecebd65/examples/simple_demo/GlutWindow.cc?at=render_window&fileviewer=file-view-default#GlutWindow.cc-177) on your local copy which just does a `CreateImage` call?
